job.title: 高级软件工程师
job.description:
This job is based in Beijing, China.
高级软件工程师- Senior Software Engineer
工作职责
：
根据需求快速开发产品配套软件
根据产线要求开发生产工具软件
编写研发项目文档
及时完成部门经理临时交办的其他任务。
任职资格
计算机或电子相关专业, 本科及以上学历,一本院校优先.
精通一门编程语言(Python优先)
熟悉CAN总线、UART、TCP等通信方式
有团队合作精神，能及时分享知识和经验；
五年工作经历
有大型仪器类项目经验者优先.
Senior Software Engineer
Job Responsibilities:
1. Quickly develop product supporting software based on requirement
2. Develop production tool software according based on requirements
3. Write R&D project documentation
4. Complete other tasks assigned by the department manager in a timely manner.
Qualifications
Computer or electronics related major, bachelor degree or above
Proficient in a programming language (Python is preferred)
Familiar with CAN bus, UART, TCP and other communication methods
Have a team spirit and be able to share knowledge and experience in a timely manner;
Five years of work experience
Experience in large-scale instrument projects is preferred.
